page.title: 12PEAR TREE COTTAGE
page.content: On Wrenthorpe Lane there is a cottage called Pear Tree Cottage.It is a big cottage,with two little cottages joined on. The big cottage is two hundred years old and the small cottages are one hundred years old.The cottages got their name because of a pear tree that was attached to the front of the big cottage.The lady who used to live in the cottages before I moved in,in January was called Mrs Keys.When she died the tree died.We have chopped the tree down now,but before that lots of people picked the pears off the tree.When my mum (Mrs Jessop) was little she went see Mrs Keys when they were just going home.Mrs Keys' daughter went and got some pears. Also my mum,(Mrs Dowson) used to go and pick pears off the tree when she went to work.
